item.description: The credit card is one of the most universally accepted and convenient payment methods, used by millions of consumers and merchants worldwide as a routine means of payment for a variety of products and services. The rapid growth of the credit card industry indicates the cardâ€™s value to the financial community, which includes consumers, merchants, and issuing banks.
